Task Name Description Due Date Status
{{task.taskName}} {{task.description}} {{task.duedate}} {{task.status}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-task-list', templateUrl: './task-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./task-list.component.css'] }) export class TaskListComponent { taskList:any; constructor(private route:Router){ const task = JSON.stringify(this.taskList) const parseTask = JSON.parse(task); const localData = localStorage.getItem('task-add') if(localData!==null){ this.taskList=JSON.parse(localData) } } }
